T-98 Condor

The T-98 is a lightweight, affordable multirole utility aircraft, featuring long, unswept wings and a two seat cockpit. This craft weights 7.4 tons and is capable of speeds up to 200m/s at an altitude of 4800m.

Javascript is disabled. View full album' alt='script>'>

A 0.625m diameter fuel pod or similar sized cargo can be attached beneath the fuselage and paradropped, landing with cargo is not recommened, as it could lead to nasty accidents.

Seen here the Condor can be converted into a light strike aircraft, although it's far less capable when compared to dedicated Ground attack jets. A 30mm cannon with 600 rounds of ammunition and a pair of 500 pound bombs are seen here.

A T-98 fires off flares, note the solar panels providing backup power for the flight control and targeting camera in case of fuel starvation.

Craft file at:http://kerbalx.com/crafts/5567/edit
